note.p: Scottish sheep-farmer. Farmed in Roxburgh, Selkirk, Dumfries, and Perthshire for more than forty years. At Laighwood, Dunkeld, Perthshire, 1861, 1871.
Census returns of Scotland 1861 (The National Archives of Scotland: Clunie 2/5), 1871 (Clunie 2/5)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858-1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 12 February 2015)
letter from Robert Elliot to George Cupples, 4 June 1869
Scotland old parish registers births 810/00 0030 0032 Wilton (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 12 February 2015)
